documents.content: Case ACME-7421 for vendor Northwind. Risk decision: denied. Reason: sanctions exposure in restricted jurisdiction. Reviewer: Marta Olsen. Confidence 0.91.
Case ACME-7422 for vendor Northwind. Risk decision: approved. Reason: no sanctions and complete KYC records. Reviewer: Luca Berg. Confidence 0.88.
Case ACME-7423 for vendor Bluefin. Risk decision: manual-review. Reason: beneficial owner mismatch across filings. Reviewer: Sara Holm. Confidence 0.79.
Policy section SAN-17: deny onboarding when sanctions exposure is confirmed in restricted jurisdictions. Keep evidence references and reviewer trace_id.
Policy section KYC-04: approve onboarding when identity, ownership, and transaction profile are complete and consistent.

queries.query: What was the risk decision for case ACME-7421?
Which status was assigned to ACME-7423?
Which policy section says to deny onboarding for sanctions exposure?
Which policy section allows approval when KYC data is complete and consistent?
What confidence value was recorded for ACME-7422?
What caused manual review for ACME-7423?
